title: Interpretation of war in a dream in detail

preview.html: Learn the interpretation of war in a dream for a single woman, married woman, pregnant woman, man, etc. in different situations. God Almighty said: “O people, inform me of my vision. From God Almighty to you, and good news to you from time to time, and in this article today from the Encyclopedia we show you the interpretation of a dream about war in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of war in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is fighting enemies by winning victory over them. This indicates that he will receive a lot of good news. But if the girl sees war in her dream without her participation. This indicates that he will receive bad news. And if a girl dreams that she is quarreling with someone? This indicates that her marriage is approaching. A single girl sees war in her dream. This indicates that there are a number of problems in her family. If a girl sees herself fighting a man and shoots an arrow into his heart. This indicates that this young man will feel love towards her, even if this arrow is golden. This indicates that a correspondence relationship will develop between them. Escaping from war in Al-Manamiri Ibn Shaheen The escape of an unmarried girl is as follows: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone is chasing her. This indicates that he is going through a lot of psychological problems. And if she saw that someone pursuing her was able to get her? This indicates that he will face many crises. But if she sees that she can escape from those who harm her, this indicates that she will overcome all the crises that she is going through. Interpretation of a dream about war and fear. Interpretation of seeing war in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a civil war between people in a dream indicates There is poverty in the country and the spread of high prices. Seeing a war between two rulers indicates the presence of an epidemic and strife in that country. If a person sees a war in his dream and eats with soldiers. This indicates that he will engage in many arguments and conflicts that will end well. But if a person sees that he is using all the weapons of war during the war. This indicates that he is trying to achieve his ambition with all his might. Interpretation of a dream about war and bombing: If one sees bombing in his dream. This is an indication that there are some false rumors about someone among the world. And if one sees in a dream a bombing operation. This indicates that he wants to buy something, but he cannot buy it. In this article we present to you the interpretation of seeing war in a dream for a single girl. We also have the opinions of the leading imams of dream interpretation of seeing war in a dream in its various forms. Follow a new encyclopedia. To interpret another dream, you can browse Instant dream interpretation application through this link. You can also browse the interpretation of war and women in a dream.

title: Seeing someone washing dishes in a dream

preview.html: It is known that the vision differs from one case to another. We dream of a dream and it has its own interpretation, so through our interpreter site we would like to provide a detailed interpretation of wash basins. Interpretation of seeing someone washing utensils in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees herself washing dishes, glass plates, and utensils. The kitchen, this indicates independence in her life. If one sees an unmarried girl washing dishes in his dream, this indicates one’s desire to marry that girl. If a single girl sees herself cleaning kitchen utensils and she is happy, this indicates more than one meaning. It indicates that she will marry a man with good morals and money, and that he will compensate her for all the hardships that she suffered in her life. It also indicates a change in her condition for the better and her emergence from an atmosphere of depression to joy. Washing the dishes also indicates an improvement in the girl’s psychological state, and that she will achieve everything she wants to achieve. Sometimes washing dishes in a dream indicates illness and it is difficult to recover, and God Almighty knows best. In the event that an unmarried girl sees herself cleaning the dishes and they shine like the purity of new glass. This indicates the approaching date of her wedding and reaching adulthood. See also: Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a vision A person washes dishes in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself washing dishes, this indicates comfort, happiness, and psychological and family stability. If the wife disagrees with her husband and sees herself cleaning the dishes, this indicates that the problems between her and her husband will be resolved and their lives will return to normal as they were. If He saw a married woman delaying childbearing, washing two bowls. This indicates good news that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. If a married woman sees herself washing dishes, and the mirror is lit in the sun. It indicates the psychological comfort and happiness that has overwhelmed her and her family. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is washing Dishes, this is good news for an imminent pregnancy. If the dishes in a married woman’s dream are very many, this indicates the change and happiness that she will enjoy. Seeing a pregnant woman washing dishes in a dream means that life will change for the better. And if he sees the dishes sparkling, this indicates full birth. And good manners, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees herself cleaning dishes. This symbolizes the psychological comfort she experiences during her pregnancy and overcoming the obstacles and difficulties she faces. Interpretation of seeing someone washing dishes in a dream about the man and its meaning. If a man sees in a dream that he is washing dishes, This indicates his good relationship and compatibility between him and his wife. Seeing a man washing dishes and shining after cleaning indicates a job offer that is suitable for him and he will excel at it. Also, seeing a man in a dream washing dishes with special metals indicates wealth and this man’s high status in his family. I saw the man washing The bowls and he was able to get rid of all the dirt on them. This is a sign of his ability to overcome his worries and problems. It also indicates achieving success and high status, one’s closeness to God, one’s adherence to obedience and avoiding the sins of

title: Interpretation of dreams that I ride a lamb in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I am riding a lamb in a dream There are many dreams that we see, so we explain in the following lines what is the interpretation of the dream that I am riding a lamb in a dream and other details that interest you... Interpretation of dreams that I am riding a lamb in a dream Interpretation of dreams that I am riding a lamb in a dream Perhaps pregnancy means meeting someone you love Or it means a lot to you, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. However, seeing yourself riding a sheep may mean that you control an important person, and God knows the unseen. When you see a ram riding, this may indicate the person who controls his life, and God knows best. Seeing yourself riding a sheep can also express control. The person is the owner of the dream, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that I am riding a motorcycle in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I am riding a motorcycle in a dream can be a sign of speed in achieving desires, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. It can express the dreamer’s desire to achieve goals quickly, and God knows best. It can also indicate not Paying attention to safety in achieving desires, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself riding a motorcycle in a dream, this may be evidence of success, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that I am riding a camel in a dream. Interpretation of the dream that I am riding a camel in a dream could be a sign of travel or rest, and God knows the unseen. When you see a camel Riding may symbolize the dreamer’s journey, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer is seen riding a camel that does not walk, it may lead to imprisonment, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself riding a camel with a hump, this may be evidence of Hajj, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams: I am riding a boat in the sea in a dream. Interpretation of the dream. That I am driving a boat in the sea in a dream can indicate good things, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen riding a boat, this may lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a single girl riding a boat may indicate recovery, and God knows the unseen. It can also reflect the vision of driving in a boat and that It is going in a good way, and it can be evidence that life is going on a good path and that God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream that I am riding a wheel in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I am driving a wheel in a dream can be a reference for benefiting, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married man riding a bike, this may indicate... Achieving goals, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. If a married woman sees herself riding a bicycle in a dream, this may be evidence of the kindness of the partnership, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself riding a bicycle, this may be a sign that things have become easier, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream Driving a car in the back seat in a dream The interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the back seat in a dream may differ depending on the driver, driving, etc. Whereas if a married woman is seen driving a car with her husband in the back seat, this may lead to him supporting her, and God knows best. However, if an unmarried girl sees a car With her fiancé in the back seat and an accident occurred with her, this may indicate matters that require some or no thought

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream of the call to prayer and the interpretation of the call to prayer for a single, married, pregnant or divorced girl, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi, and others. Interpretations of the call in a dream are among the beautiful, wonderful, and very distinctive dreams that we often see in a dream, as they carry many important indications and signs for humans, as the call is actually the slogan of prayer for Muslims and Muslims. A call to perform the five prayers imposed on the Islamic nation, and there is also the call to prayer after which the prayer is established and then the prayer, as the first muezzin in Islam was the companion Bilal bin Rabah, who called to the pulpit for the call to prayer on the authority of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. Also, the call to prayer in a dream is evidence On the coming wellness and happiness of the dreamer, which must be completely known, as we show you below the complete interpretation of the dream interpreter Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the call in a dream: The call in a dream indicates Hajj if the call is in the months of Hajj. Perhaps it indicates gossip that causes movement, transition, and preparation for war. It can indicate theft, high rank, honorable position, rank, reason heard, or woman for a single person. He may refer to the correct news, and if the communication was in a direction other than the qiblah, or the communication was in a language other than Arabic, or he had a black face, then perhaps he told us lies and gossip. Perhaps this indicates the seller and the Kharijites in that country, and the muezzin is the caller to charity, or the broker, or the one who arranges marriages, or the king’s messenger or his deputy, or the caller in the army, and if a woman calls. From him in a dream to the minaret of the mosque, a great heresy appears in the country, and if the ears of boys take control of the king’s ignorance, especially if the call to prayer is not at the appropriate time. And whoever sees: that he calls for a minaret and is worthy of the state, he will gain status as long as his voice reaches and reaches, even if He was not worthy of the state and his enemies multiplied. He becomes a leader over them, and if he is a merchant who profits from his trade, the call to prayer may be an indication of supplication, justice, obedience, goodness, or safety and salvation from the machinations of Satan. Whoever sees that he is calling to a well, then if he is in a country of disbelief, he is calling people to the way of religion, If he is in Muslim countries, he is a spy. Perhaps he was the owner of a sect that called people to it. And whoever sees that he is calling to prayer while he is a Muslim, then he commands what is good. And whoever sees that he is calling and no one responds to him, then he is from an unjust people. And whoever sees that he is calling on his neighbor’s roof, his neighbor is cheating on his wife. And whoever sees that he is calling on his neighbor’s roof, he is cheating on his wife. He calls out the call on the roof of the Kaaba, then he is an innovator, or he insults the Companions of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. And whoever sees that he is uttering the call while lying down, his wife will irritate and disturb the people with her tongue, and if he is not married, he will get married. And whoever sees that he is calling to the market is a thief’s spy. And whoever sees that he is calling out On the door of the Sultan, it testifies to the truth, and calling in alleys and markets indicates a good life. Whoever sees that he is calling for an escort, he will be accused of theft, and the call may also indicate separation from a partner. Whoever sees that he is calling for a call to...

title: Interpretation of a beautiful girl in a dream – To see a beautiful woman in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a beautiful woman for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether it was a kiss, marriage, or engagement, dreamed of a sweet girl. Ibn Sirin and others were born. Interpretation of a beautiful girl in a dream: If a girl in a dream is beautiful, it indicates the coming year with kindness and comfort. The woman may be referring to the dump, the warehouse, the box, everything in which a person deposits his belongings. Perhaps it indicates his cemetery land, because a person returns to it when he leaves it, and perhaps it indicates confinement and companionship, because he shares pleasure and money with the man, and perhaps the woman revealed it to someone who knows secrets such as the bed and clothes, the tree that bears fruit, the well into which the rope is poured, and the tread. The one he tramples, the tool on which he places his pen, his war chariot and his seat. Interpretation of a beautiful woman in a man’s dream A beautiful woman in a man’s dreams is his life and his life, and in the interpretation it describes his general condition and situation. If he sees her as beautiful and elegant, this is a sign of his balanced and harmonious life. It is recommended that the beautiful woman in a man’s dream becomes known, because in this context the dreamer can infer the meaning of the dream through the name of the woman he saw. Something in the dream indicates that the dreamer is on the verge of a world New, such as marriage or travel. It is praiseworthy in the interpretation for a man to see in a dream a beautiful and elegant woman kissing him, talking to him, or sitting with him. It is preferable in a dream for a man to see as if he is marrying or engaged to a beautiful girl in his dream, provided that the beauty of this girl is not attractive. Or tempting, because a dream in this context can indicate hardship, fatigue and problems. The best beauties in a man’s dream are women who wear modest clothing and do not show adornment, because if a woman appears in a dream in a short dress, then in the interpretation it is a fad or temptation and can indicate On unhappiness, fatigue, and worries. Interpretation of a beautiful woman in one dream. If a beautiful woman in a man’s dream refers to the adornments and joys of this worldly life, then that generally refers in a woman’s dream to her luck in food, money, and marriage. It takes, to some extent, fatigue and patience for a girl to understand what she wants from the world. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a beautiful woman she knows, if she is nearby, this indicates the proximity of comfort or joy. Khadija, etc. A beautiful woman in one dream can indicate an imminent marriage if he sees her wearing jewelry or a wedding dress, or sees in her something that indicates joy. Interpretation of a beautiful woman in a married dream: A beautiful woman appears in a married woman’s dreams to indicate many meanings. If a married woman sees That her husband in a dream marries a woman of extraordinary beauty, in the interpretation this indicates a somewhat tense psychological state, because the extreme beauty of a woman in a dream indicates hardship and turmoil. Especially if the woman he saw was fat, this indicates prosperity in terms of life and livelihood in the future, and the best beautiful women in the dream. As for skinny women, if they appear in a dream, they are a sign of poverty, deficiency, or want.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing gold in a dream is complete from the books of leading scholars - dream interpreters and through the Trend website, which specializes in the science of interpreting visions and dreams. If you are interested in knowing the complete interpretation of gold in a dream, all you have to do is follow the article. Why do you dream of seeing gold in a dream in its entirety? According to the Sunnah, he sees Leading scholars in interpreting dreams completely consider a gold alloy in a dream, because this can indicate many fears and pain in the dreamer’s life. In addition, seeing gold in a dream completely formed in a complete dream can be a disaster that will prevail over him, and perhaps the loss of a loved one, And God knows best. Also, seeing a hand full of gold in a dream indicates paralysis that may affect the dreamer’s hand, and God knows best. In a dream, it seems that you see an eye turning into gold, which indicates blindness, God forbid. Seeing gold completely melting in a dream may mean avoiding things that It may disturb the dreamer, and God knows best. Why do you dream of gold in a married woman’s dream? It is said that seeing gold in a married woman’s dream indicates the benefits and good things that she will obtain. It also says that seeing all of the gold in a married woman’s dream is evidence of food, and her husband’s food is permissible, and God knows best. Why does a pregnant woman dream of gold? Gold in a dream full of pregnant women is a sign of support and kindness, and that God will bless her with a male son, and God knows best. Seeing gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a whole golden ring in a dream indicates a failed and inappropriate marriage for the dreamer, and God knows best. This also applies to seeing complete gold bullion in a dream, which is sometimes a warning of loss or loss of money and grief, God forbid. Ibn Sirin indicated in his interpretation of seeing gold in a dream complete that this is one of the hateful dreams and evidence of calamities, calamities and troubles that will befall the dreamer, and God knows best. Often, seeing gold indicates the disappointment and loss that the dreamer may experience, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin said that dreaming of gold or wearing gold in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer is turning away from God and committing mistakes and evil, and God knows best. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, Leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of a dream about distributing drinks in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about distributing drinks in a dream. What is most associated with joy, pleasure, and happy occasions is distributing sherbet, as it is a simple and beautiful way to express the happiness that overwhelms the place. Loved ones gather in one place under the guise of pleasure and joy. We may see sherbet in our dreams and we would like to know the interpretation it brings. Different. We will find the interpretation of the dream of distributing drinks in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of distributing drinks in a dream from the positive side: Every dream that visits us during our sleep is linked to its interpretation of the social and psychological state of the monarch. As the same dream is interpreted for each person in a different way, and with regard to the interpretation of the dream of distributing drinks in a dream, the interpretation of good and evil, but we will start with the positive interpretation of this dream: Sherbet in a dream is associated with joy, tidings, and pleasures as they are in reality. Distributing sherbet in a dream indicates good events that will happen to the pioneer and will be A reason for his happiness. Interpretation of a dream of distributing drinks in a dream. It cures diseases. If the dreamer sees himself distributing drinks in a dream, this indicates the good that will come from him. If the dreamer is a merchant, then the interpretation of a dream of distributing drinks in a dream is a great profit. But if the dreamer has a debt, then his dream shows the expiration of his debt and its repayment. If The dreamer is a student, then this indicates his superiority and success. If the dreamer is poor, then this dream is good news about wealth. Cold drinks in a dream indicate goodness and blessings. Seeing glasses in a dream shows the love of others for the dreamer. Ibn Sirin believes that drinking red sherbet indicates successful social and emotional relationships. Interpretation of a dream about distributing drinks In a dream, from the negative side: If the dreamer sees red sherbet juice in his dream, this indicates distress and anxiety in his life. Red sherbet juice indicates the hatred and hatred that fill the dreamer’s life. Seeing red sherbet juice is also associated with an indicator of illness. If sherbet is mixed with water in a dream, this indicates Deception and CunningA hot drink in a dream is a bad omen, as it indicates worries, problems, and losses. If a dreamer drinks sherbet in his sleep while he is sad, this means that a scandal will happen to him. Sour drinks indicate the fortuneteller’s failure to achieve his goals. Interpretation of a dream about distributing a drink in a dream to a single woman: Handing out sherbet in a dream indicates to a single woman To the end of her worries and sadness. If she sees herself distributing drinks in her dream, this indicates the approach of her marriage. Eating sherbet shows that her current situation has changed for the better. If the taste of the drink is sour and sour, it shows the obstacles that stand in her way. Red color sherbet indicates a romantic relationship between you. Interpretation of a dream of distributing a drink in a dream for a married woman In a married woman’s dream: This dream indicates the stability of her life and the end of her problems and troubles. The vision shows that she will get something new in her life, which may be a new job or a new home. If she has not given birth to children yet, then this dream is good news for her that she will become pregnant. If she sees herself distributing drinks to Her children, this portends good things for her and her family

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a circle in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a circle in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a circle in a dream, which is a geometric shape, which is a closed shape, which consists of several points connected to each other, and it is taught to children, and many people see geometric shapes in their lives, and this is normal, but seeing a circle constantly in a dream It increases their desire to know what is the best interpretation of a dream about seeing a circle, where the circular shape is the only shape that shows perfection, as it does not contain edges, for the circle symbolizes the world, as it refers to women, and indicates years and months, and also indicates change. The days also show the year full of ambition and dreams, and it also shows security. The circle shows the wife, life and home. Interpretation of a dream of a circle for a man in a dream: A man’s vision of a circle in a dream is that it refers to a woman because it refers to the world, because it shows his wife’s perfection, whether in beauty or in Creation. It also indicates that that year will be full of joy, happiness and good news. Interpretation of a dream of a circle for a pregnant woman in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman’s menstrual cycle is only evidence of the end of her pregnancy. It also indicates her safety and the safety of her fetus. Likewise, seeing a circle in a woman’s dream Pregnant in the last months is a sign of the ease of her birth. Interpretation of a dream of a circle for a married woman in a dream: A married woman’s view of the shape of a circle indicates completion in the sense of completing or completing a certain task. A married woman’s dream circle also indicates a year full of joy, success, and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about a circle For a single woman in a dream: Seeing a woman in a dream is an indication of the beginning of a new stage in her life and the end of a previous stage. It is also evidence of her close marriage with her, and the fulfillment of her cherished desire after patience and effort. You are not required to see a drawing of a circle, but you can see any shape that symbolizes A circle, such as a clock or anything else in the shape of a circle. Therefore, seeing a clock in a circle is a gateway to the beginning of a new phase in real life. Also, seeing a circular shape in public places indicates protection, safety, and security.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: In this article, we examine for you the interpretation of a dream about cats in detail. Cats are pets that it is preferable to own, care for, and take care of at home. Seeing them is love for oneself for some and for others. It causes fear, and on the other hand, in dream science, it is. One of the most common, strange and bizarre visions of animals to know the interpretations of this dream. Dream interpretations are directly related to the dreamer's life. It reflects the psychological state he feels, whether of joy or sadness, whether they give him good news or warn him of a problem or crisis, but what about the interpretations of seeing cats in a dream? We will learn this in an encyclopedia. Dream about cats. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing cats in a dream. Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing cats in a dream is one of the hateful dreams that indicate failure at work or loss of money, and God knows best. Seeing cats entering the dreamer’s house means that a cunning and deceitful person will enter his house in Reality. If the dreamer sees that he has turned into a cat in a dream, then this vision represents a reflection of the state of fear and anxiety prevailing in the dreamer. As for eating cat meat in a dream, this vision is disturbing and repulsive, and indicates that the dreamer is practicing magic. If the cat is black in the dream, then This vision symbolizes a major problem in the dreamer’s life. Seeing cats scratching in a dream means that there is a person in the dream with bad morals who seeks to harm him. If a cat is killed in a dream, this vision is not good and indicates that he is suffering from worries and sorrows, and this vision indicates that he will be exposed to To injustice in reality. As for seeing a group of kittens in a dream, this vision indicates goodness and happiness for the pioneer. Seeing a cat in a dream is a sign of the presence of an evil person, while a female cat is a sign of kindness and nourishment. If the dreamer is attacked by a cat, then This vision expresses the fears and problems that the dreamer suffers from in his life. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of a dream about cats. Imam Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing cats in a dream as a reflection of deception, deceit and betrayal by some of those around the dreamer in reality. If black cats are killed in a dream, this vision is an indication of Achieving goals and desires, as seeing black cats is an undesirable vision for the dreamer. In the case of seeing cats, this vision expresses changing circumstances for the better and achieving success. Seeing female cats in a dream is a good vision and an indication of kindness and abundance. If you see white cats, this dream indicates The dreamer’s lack of moral support. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing cats in a dream. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the attack of some cats on the dreamer as problems and worries that the dreamer brings out as a result of some problems. In the event of being bitten by cats in a dream, this vision indicates illness and may also indicate Difficulties. Seeing playing with cats in a dream is a good vision for the dreamer and indicates success in reality, as this vision in general indicates kindness and sustenance. If you see a gray cat in a dream, this dream indicates that your friend has betrayed you. A cat in a dream for a single woman. Cats in a dream For a girl

title: Interpretation of Surat Al-Kahf in a dream for single, pregnant and married women

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of Surat Al-Kahf in a dream, because reading this surah is desirable, especially on Friday. The Messenger recommended its reading, saying: Whoever recites Surah Al-Kahf on Friday, God will illuminate him between the two Fridays, and seeing the general recitation of the Qur’an in a dream is promising. In a dream in the various cases in which such a vision occurs.Interpretation of Surat Al-Kahf in a dreamReading Surat Al-Kahf in a dream by Ibn ShirinIbn Sirin says that reading Surat Al-Kahf in its entirety is evidence that God Almighty will accomplish for him whatever He wants. It also indicates the Messenger’s connection to God Almighty, his obedience, and avoiding Sins. Whoever reads Surah Al-Kahf in his sleep, God Almighty will relieve him of his worries, relieve him of his illness, prolong his life in obedience to Him, and indicates protection and blessing in money, family, and children. Whoever sees Surah Al-Kahf in his dream, his vision indicates that God Almighty will help him to Paying off his debts and alleviating the distress he is experiencing due to debts, as he promises him that God Almighty will provide him a lot. Of the sustenance that will enrich him with this question. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Kahf for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Kahf, this vision means that God Almighty will give birth to her easily and smoothly, and bless her and her fetus with health and wellness. As Surah Al-Kahf in a dream shows For a pregnant woman, God Almighty will provide her husband with an abundance of sustenance and abundant goodness that will suffice them from the worries of this world. Also, Surat Al-Kahf in a pregnant woman’s dream shows freedom from distress and the end of the problems that surround her. Some commentators said that a pregnant woman who sees Surat Al-Kahf in her dream means that the date of Her birth will be earlier than the supposed date set for her by the treating doctor. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Kahf in a dream for a single woman. Reading Surat Al-Kahf is one of the promising visions for a single girl, as it indicates that she will achieve what she wants in life. Surat Al-Kahf indicates a long life, abundance of sustenance, and freedom from Worries and problems. It was reported that a girl who saw Surat Al-Kahf in her dream indicates that she will marry a well-to-do man, who has good morals, and she will live happily and happily with him. Some dream interpreters say that an unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Kahf or hears it read in a dream This dream portends the fulfillment of a desire that she wanted very much. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Kahf in a dream for a married woman. One of the most promising visions for a married woman is to see herself reading Surat Al-Kahf in her dream. It is good news that God Almighty will grant her and her husband a lot of goodness, and their lives will be stable. If she sees herself She reads Surat Al-Kahf to her children in a dream. This vision reflects what this mother does to her children, as well as her cunning and constant fear of them. It is said that reading Surat Al-Kahf in a married woman’s dream indicates the end of the disputes between her and her husband and the beginning of stability and reassurance in the relationship between them and that God Almighty will bless them both in Their life together. If a married woman has not given birth and she sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Kahf, or she sees that she is reading the Qur’an in general, then this vision is good news for her.
